response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it could significantly enhance your operations or personal projects. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $15,000, making it a compelling opportunity for you. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially facilitating this transaction for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 14000}
